lead_paragraph: QUARTARARO--Sally. The Boards and staff of James Lenox House Association and Carnegie East House are greatly saddened by the death of Sally Quartararo. Our thoughts go out to the entire Quartararo family and her son, our good friend and benefactor, Raymond Quartararo, who is dedicated to quality elder care and supportive aging in place. Respectfully, Barbara R. Evans, President, James Lenox House Association; Beatrice Broadwater, President, Carnegie East House; Joseph H. Girven, Executive Director 1/3
